properties.address: 100 WEST BROOKHAVEN DR NE, ATLANTA GA 30319
properties.tree_description: None Reason for Removal:OtherComments:This pine exhibits an uneven crown with a co-dominant leader and pronounced weight distribution toward the residence. Along the upper main stem, a longitudinal split with associated canker tissue was observed. The wound has produced ram’s-horn-shaped wound wood, but closure remains incomplete, indicating limited compartmentalization of the defect. The co-dominant union contains included bark, increasing the likelihood of separation under wind or load stress. The upper crown section demonstrates a lateral bias over the house, with diminished foliage density and off-color needles relative to the opposing leader, suggesting partial canopy decline.
